title: Understanding DAVERAGE
text: The DAVERAGE function is used in databases to perform calculations on a specific field of data. It requires a condition to be met for the calculation to be applied.

title: Focus on the Condition
text: The DAVERAGE function doesn't just calculate an average; it applies a condition to determine which entries to include in the calculation.

hintAnswer: calculates average of numbers in a table field that pass a test
title: Identify the Correct Function
text: Which function calculates the average of numbers in a table field that pass a test?
choices: calculates average of numbers in a table field that pass a test
counts the number of numeric entries in a table field that pass a test
adds each element that passes the test, and counts them
